column5: I figured I would take my better half down to the Niagara - she has heard all about it for a long time now lol.  I just checked the satellite map photos, and it looks really dirty!!  Would you say there is 3 ft vis there?!!  Thanks so much for the help
They bite with less vis than that.  Go, have fun!  Joey
Oh I know!!!    lol.  Those buggers will smack in chocolate sometimes.  I just want her to get some!!

They do sometimes bite in the mud, but they pulled the ice boom  last week and the river was full of ice.  Not sure if it is clear yet haven't heard?? I would find out first if your driving from any distance.
not sure about today but on friday there was still ice in the upper niagara in fort erie.
Niagara yesterday was around 6" vis.  I didnt even bother launching the boat I just drove back home
